莐字的基本解释

莐
chén
〔莐藩〕一种草本植物，根茎入药，即知母。

莐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《廣韻》直深切，平侵，澄。］
见“莐藩”。

莐字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莐； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第35
【唐韻】直深切，音沉。【集韻】直禁切，音鴆。【說文】草也。【爾雅·釋草】蕁，莐藩。【疏】知母也。【郭註】生山上，葉如韭。　又【玉篇】丁敢切，音黕。義同。

莐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
莐字的起名意思

暂无。

Pinch
Basic explanation of words
Pinch
chén
[Xinfan] A herbaceous plant whose rhizome is used as medicine, namely Anemarrhena.
Pinch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Guangyun" has a straight and deep cut, flat intrusion, and clearness. ]
See "Xin Fan".
Pinch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　莐; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1033 to 35
[Tang Yun] Straight and deep, with deep tone. [Jiyun] Directly forbidden to cut, sound bad. [Said Wen] Cao Ye. [Erya Shicao] Xun, Qin Fan. [Sparse] Zhimu also. [Guo's Note] The leaves are like leeks on the mountain.　[Jade Chapter] Ding Gan cut, the sound is red. The same meaning.
